name: AVANIM
description:
AVANIM specializes in the development of mobile applications, dynamic website and e-commerce platforms as well as specific software such as CRM, ERP and open source POS. We offer you our advice. We can help with the creation of your website, the development of your specific applications, and the maintenance of your projects. For years we have been specializing in the most reliable open source solutions on the market:
Prestashop
Magento
Wordpress
Drupal
But also the most stable frameworks:
Symfony
Zend
CakePHP
READ MORE...
